text:
JNDI Resources HOW-TO.

In section 2 of 'Generic JavaBean Resources' there are 3 typos

   1. <Description>. Should be <description>
   2. </Description>. Should be </description>
   3. <resource-env-ref>...<resource-env-ref>. The last tag
      should be </resource-env-ref>.
creator: janekdb@yahoo.co.uk
craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
text: It looks like Remy fixed this but forgot to close the bug report.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
Actually, no. I didn't commit the fix in the 4.0 branch, because the source 
files are messed up there (strange EOLs yet again ;-)).
